duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for handling front office reception and administrative duties, including greeting, answering phones, and sorting, distributing, and sending mail.
Serve as backup for payroll processing, as needed.
Data entry into accounting and other information systems.
Order and maintain office supplies and forms.
Provide administrative support to various departments.
Assist in compiling and producing production and various reports as requested by Management.
Support Office Manager and other admin staff as a backup, as needed.

education_certification.credential: Must be at least 18 years of age.
